English: Select two masked characters. Next turn, they play 2 cards
Spanish: Selecciona dos enmascarados, el proximo turno jugaran 2 cartas

English: If the impostor is selected, one of their cards becomes an innocent card
Spanish: Si el seleccionado es impostor, una de sus cartas sera de inocente

English: Select a masked character. One of their played cards will be highlighted
Spanish: Selecciona un enmascarado, una de sus cartas ya jugadas sera resaltada

English: Another character's card will be highlighted instead
Spanish: La carta de otro jugador sera resaltada

English: This card belongs to an impostor
Spanish: Esta carta pertenece a un impostor

English: This card belongs to an innocent
Spanish: Esta carta pertenece a un inocente
